title: position
description:
A report message of the position (among other things) of the drone. Similar to ADS-B. Probably not all drones will be able to provide all values. 
*** I inferred some basic values but I don't know exactly which kind of values can provide a small drone.
*** Also, probably the serial number is not suitable to represent the drone in a tag and we could think of a kind of identifier, like the operator name.

vx.description: X Speed (in Latitude direction, positive: going north) (float)

vy.description: Y Speed (in Latitude direction, positive: going north) (float)

vz.description: Z Speed (in Latitude direction, positive: going north) (float)

unable.description: The drone cannot comply with the flight plan/instructions and includes a code indicating the reason, something like MALFUNCTION, BATTERY, SEPARATION... but keeps sending its position and intent to the UTM. The drone should be able to distinguish when it comes back to the flight path and can delete this flag.
